text:
Cover Art
Alien Scout
2021 Nominee: Chesley Award for Best Cover: Magazine
Arjun Amky is a freelance designer specialized in creating illustrations for ads and games, and has also worked as a concept artist for novels and short films. Arjun likes to create realistic-looking environments and their art is inspired by subjects like war, history, nature, and steampunk.
